name: Icinga
description:
Icinga is an open-source computer system and network monitoring application. It was originally created as a fork of the Nagios system monitoring application in 2009.
#### License:
* GPL Version 2
#### Hardware Requirement:
* By default one VM with 4 vCPU, 8 GB RAM
#### Resources Installed:
* icinga2 version 2.10.2-1
* icingaweb2 2.6.2-1
#### Operating System:
* CentOS Linux release 7.6.1810
#### Platform:
* AHV
#### Lifecycle:
* NA
#### Limitations:
* No lifecycle management actions.
* Single VM Icinga Instance. HA not available.
* Not recommended for the production use. 
#### Other Instructions:
* Open port 80 under Firewall/Security group.
author: Nutanix
